abstract: Maryland prosecutor Marilyn Mosby asks judge to order separate trial for William Porter and Lt Brian Rice, two of six police officers charged in death of Freddie Gray.
lead_paragraph: State’s Attorney Marilyn Mosby of Baltimore wants a judge to order a separate trial for two of the six officers charged in the death of Freddie Gray.

headline.main: Maryland: Prosecutor Seeks Separate Trials in Gray Case
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Prosecutor Seeks Separate Trials in Gray Case

snippet: State’s Attorney Marilyn Mosby of Baltimore wants a judge to order a separate trial for two of the six officers charged in the death of Freddie Gray.
